name: Star Runner (itch) (Captain7luffy, jrobertson, Hunter Holbrook, Clenhart, konkeydonggg)
name_original: Star Runner (itch) (Captain7luffy, jrobertson, Hunter Holbrook, Clenhart, konkeydonggg)
description:
Aboard the Star Runner, a cargo ship returning from a mine on the fringes of the galaxy. Marzin leaves the cockpit to find that their crewmates have been infected by a parasitic worm that was hidden in a rock. As the last remaining crewmate, they must fight against the onslaught of attackers. Can they survive?

=[Roles]=
Engineer - Chris Lenhart
Level Designer - Tyler Katz
Audio Designer - Hunter Holbrook
UI Designer - Hunter Holbrook
Puzzle Designer - Chris Lenhart
Animator - Tift Hollis
Material / Texture Artist - Tyler Katz
Narrative Designer - Jacob Robertson
